title: Quarantine Crazy
description:
In the show’s first segment recorded from home, Jillian and Cindy vent about how the stress of self-quarantine is affecting them. Then we’re back to the last time the team was all together for tips about working out with knee pain, and the power in saying, “I don’t know.”

Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com
